{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/title|release}}
{{cpp/thread/unique_lock/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
mutex_type* release() noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Breaks the association of the associated mutex, if any, and {{c|*this}}. 

No locks are unlocked. If {{c|*this}} held ownership of the associated mutex prior to the call, the caller is now responsible to unlock the mutex.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Pointer to the associated mutex or a null pointer if there was no associated mutex.
